mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_DETAIL AS PRODUCT_DETAIL, P.PRICE AS PRICE, P.STAR AS STAR, P.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT, P.DELIVERY_FEE AS DELIVERY_FEE, P.OPTIONS AS OPTIONS, P.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, P.NATURE_ID AS NATURE_ID, P.PRODUCT_STATUS AS PRODUCT_STATUS, P.REGISTER_DATE AS REGISTER_DATE, P.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, M.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME, M.FILE_ROUTE AS FILE_ROUTE, M.MEDIA_NAME AS MEDIA_NAME FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN MEDIA M ON P.PRODUCT_ID=M.GROUP_ID ORDER BY P.REGISTER_DATE DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_DETAIL AS PRODUCT_DETAIL, P.PRICE AS PRICE, P.STAR AS STAR, P.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT, P.DELIVERY_FEE AS DELIVERY_FEE, P.OPTIONS AS OPTIONS, P.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, P.NATURE_ID AS NATURE_ID, P.PRODUCT_STATUS AS PRODUCT_STATUS, P.REGISTER_DATE AS REGISTER_DATE, P.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, M.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME, M.FILE_ROUTE AS FILE_ROUTE, M.MEDIA_NAME AS MEDIA_NAME FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN MEDIA M ON P.PRODUCT_ID=M.GROUP_ID ORDER BY P.STAR DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_DETAIL AS PRODUCT_DETAIL, P.PRICE AS PRICE, P.STAR AS STAR, P.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT, P.DELIVERY_FEE AS DELIVERY_FEE, P.OPTIONS AS OPTIONS, P.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, P.NATURE_ID AS NATURE_ID, P.PRODUCT_STATUS AS PRODUCT_STATUS, P.REGISTER_DATE AS REGISTER_DATE, P.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, M.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME, M.FILE_ROUTE AS FILE_ROUTE, M.MEDIA_NAME AS MEDIA_NAME FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN MEDIA M ON P.PRODUCT_ID=M.GROUP_ID WHERE CATEGORY=#{data} ORDER BY P.STAR DESC
